Title: Authorizes certain entities to require the wearing of face coverings and masks
Summary: Authorizes certain entities to require the wearing of face coverings and masks and to ask a person to leave the premises who refuses to wear a face covering or mask; provides an exemption for children under the age of two and for those who cannot medically tolerate wearing a face covering or mask; requires such entities to place a sign or poster at the entrance of the premises notifying persons entering the premises of the requirement to wear a face covering or mask.
LawCode: Add ยง390-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to authorizing certain entities to require the wearing of face coverings and face masks; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
